Title: Chen Yonggui
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: The Mao quote reads "Be determined, do not be afraid of sacrifice. Eliminate all difficulties, go all out for victory" (下定决心。不怕牺牲。排除万难。去争取胜利).
Theme: Chen YongguiModels and MartyrsQuotations from Chairman MaoCultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)
